description:
Tutoring of students for the ACT and/or SAT Test.

Tutoring takes place at the local library, student's home or office location.

Qualifications:

* College degree or current college student

* Experience tutoring and/or teaching test preparation

* References

* Background check

* Reliable vehicle

Job Types: Part-time, Contract

Pay: $18.00 - $25.00 per hour

Benefits:

  • Flexible schedule
  • Referral program

Experience level:

  • 2 years

Grade school specialties:

  • English
  • High school
  • Math
  • Reading
  • Science

Schedule:

  • Day shift
  • Monday to Friday
  • Weekends as needed

Application Question(s):

  • What was your SAT score? ACT score?

Education:

  • Bachelor's (Preferred)

Experience:

  • Teaching: 1 year (Preferred)
  • test prep: 1 year (Required)
  • Tutoring: 2 years (Required)

Language:

  • English (Required)

License/Certification:

  • Teaching Certification (Preferred)
  • Substitute Teaching Certification (Preferred)

Work Location: In person
title: Test Prep Tutors Needed (ACT/SAT)
